snippet: Sloane Stephens of the United States surrendered a first-set lead and could not recover in a tightly contested loss, 7-5, 6-4, to Samantha Stosur of Australia on Sunday at the French Open.
abstract: Sloane Stephens of the United States surrendered a first-set lead and could not recover in a tightly contested loss, 7-5, 6-4, to Samantha Stosur of Australia on Sunday at the French Open.

headline.main: Stephens Stays Close, but Comes Up Short Against Stosur
